This app needs location and Bluetooth permissions to:
• Connect to your Sony camera via Bluetooth
• Access GPS coordinates to sync with your camera
• Provide accurate location data for your photos

Background location access enables:
• Continuous GPS sync when the app is minimized
• Location tracking even when the screen is off
• Seamless photo geotagging during long shooting sessions
